channel.title: How to Pervent Keyloggers to keylog your pc
channel.description:
AS YOU CAN SEE ON SCREENSHOT I WAS CHATTING WITH SAM He uses his Key logging program to key log others he injected some kinda cracker in a picture with a suspicious link! So, if you see a IMG link that isnt in img tags then dont click it...
If you know you have a keylogger You can always end task it unless its cloaked! all you need to do is press ctrl+ alt+ del to open Task Manager and endtask everything except these files So endtask everything except the SYSTEM LOCAL SERVICE and NETWORK Services and make sure you dont end task explorer.exe if you do by accident click on the application Tab and click new task and type in explorer and it will open it up again... So dont end task the circled files!! [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m181/zirakac/THINGSNOTTOENDTASK.jpg[/img] And once you end tasked all of them you can re open the program you know is not hacked... Some programs might re open ... auto matically i will find a bypass for that too I will update the thread
hope this helps ~Zirak
BTW i posted this thread because RagingCoders another forum got hacked... So im afraid this might get hacked by this gay hacker called SAM I will not post link to either of those forums because their might be a risk of getting keylogged...

Thank you for reading.[/quote]

item.title: How to Pervent Keyloggers to keylog your pc
item.dc:creator: @regecks1 regecks`
item.description:
@regecks1 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:11, topic:39848”][quote author=Zirakac link=topic=55902.msg691540#msg691540 date=1167233368]
Hoped i helped
~Zirak
[/quote]
No, you didn’t sorry. This is one of the most basic things ever. And believe me, I know nothing about computers. How to type and click and do a little bit of Java is all I can do.[/quote]If you have nothing good to say … how does the rest of it go?

But yah, you should always be on the look-out for unknown processes running on your computer.

ProcessExplorer from http://www.sysinternals.com will assist you further, it is an advanced “task manager”, that lets you monitor file handle activity etc by process, and also displays a more advanced process tree.

For example, inspecting what handles my Firefox process currently has open:

It will further clue you in to what exactly the process is up to, and whether it is legitimate or malicious.

Read full topic

item.title: How to Pervent Keyloggers to keylog your pc
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

Yeh but viruscanner takes longer to scan when u can endtask it although it wont be permanently gone
you can do it the old fasion way look at the suspicious program name on TaskManager then perform a quick search in your Local Disc so hold CTRL + F in Local Disc select all files and folders and for example the suspicous flie is called k3yl0gg3r.exe you search that in their and wait for the pc to pick it up its usually stored in Windows folder when you find it endtask it from Task Manager and then delete it other wise it will say Sorry , The file cannot be deleted since its already in use…
Thats old fashion way other wise you can use Virusscanner that can take hours if you have old computer with fuck load of stuff

Hoped i helped
~Zirak

Read full topic
